member.name: D2D1_ANTIALIAS_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how the edges of nontext primitives are rendered.

member.name: D2D1_ANTIALIAS_MODE.D2D1_ANTIALIAS_MODE_PER_PRIMITIVE
member.summary: Edges are antialiased using the Direct2D per-primitive method of high-quality antialiasing.

member.name: D2D1_ANTIALIAS_MODE.D2D1_ANTIALIAS_MODE_ALIASED
member.summary: Objects are aliased in most cases. Objects are antialiased only when they are drawn to a render target created by the method and Direct3D multisampling has been enabled on the backing DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI) surface.
